title: NoteFragmented
description: Event emitted when a note has been processed by the KG generator

note_id.description: ID of the note that was processed

correlation_id.description: ID of the original new_note event that triggered this

status.description: Result of the knowledge graph generation process

entities.description: Number of entities extracted from the note

relations.description: Number of relation types used in the knowledge graph

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the note was processed
